comments.body: if you don't pass the `--directory` parameter, it will only create a gzipped bundle.. so the folder `/tmp/build-test/bundle/programs/server` will not exists

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +52,56 @@  mongo --eval 'rs.initiate({_id:"rs0", members: [{"_id":1, "host":"localhost:27017"}]})'
- npm run lint
- travis_retry meteor build --headless /tmp/build
- mkdir /tmp/build-test
- tar -xf /tmp/build/Rocket.Chat.tar.gz -C /tmp/build-test/
